price: 91. Mpe koningana ya mabele ezuaki bango (bwa etumbu), mpe bakomaki bibembe o bandako bia bango.
arabic: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلرَّجۡفَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دَارِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhathumu al-rajfatu fa-aṣbaḥū fī dārihim jāthimīna
